website_summaries.verdict: Onitsuka Tiger Serrano Slip-Ons are true vintage models with just a hint of modern elements thrown in to make them more adaptable to the times. The slip-on characteristic makes the shoes easy to put on and off, yet keeps them snug and secure on the feet when they need to be, even without the use of laces. Because the shoes are so lightweight, they can be easily packed and taken with you when you travel. And belying that thin and light frame is a supportive profile that provides great footing during hikes and walks.
pros: Onitsuka Tiger Serrano Slip-Ons are super comfy and feel like socks on the feet, plenty of purchasers say
Many users are all praises for the look of these minimalistic kicks from the Onitsuka Tiger brand
The shoes are “packable for travel,” according to lots of users who are impressed with how light these feel when worn
According to some reviews, Onitsuka Tiger Serrano Slip-On shoes support the feet better than their thin silhouette lets on
The sneakers are easy to slip on and off, a few consumers claim
A handful of testers have commented that the shoes are well made and are even more so than the Mexico 66 Slip-Ons
These are value-for-money shoes, a small number of individuals have reported
A couple of people have stated that these kicks from the Onitsuka Tiger brand’s low-top collection have a perfect snug fit that feels like they belong to your feet
cons: Although the width is spot on, Onitsuka Tiger Serrano Slip-On shoes’ sizing runs large, several have stated
More than a few have wished that these shoes come in more colors

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. All You Need to Know is ALL Onitsuka Tigers run a half size too large, so order a half size smaller than normal. No big deal once you know that. I've hiked many miles in these shoes over fairly steep rocky terrain. I prefer minimal shoes like this when doing so when snakes and cactus aren't an issue as I get better footing. These are great for everyday running around, slip on/off easily.
customer_reviews.author: A Man Named Bob

customer_reviews.title: True to size and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wear a women’s 9.5 almost always. I purchased a men’s size 8 and they fit perfectly. I don’t love that they don’t have laces, but they fit true to size and are exactly as photographed and described. They are also extremely comfortable. I’ve worn them significantly more than I ever expected.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Holes for laces are faux
customer_reviews.text: You can’t put shoe laces in these even though they have holes for shoe laces... the holes are fake... they’re really ugly. Don’t buy if you think you can put laces in them to make them look less ridiculous. They run a bit large if you decide hideous/ laceless shoes are for you.
customer_reviews.author: CK shopping

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and fits as expected but I’m suspicious
customer_reviews.text: It sure does look great but the material felt cheap and thin and very very light. The size fit as what I would normally get. A bit snug due to the garter as expected with a slip on similar to a slip on sperry. I’m still suspicious with the if this is a knock off but it looks great on and I’ll probably still use it.
customer_reviews.author: Charmie P.

customer_reviews.title: not good quality
customer_reviews.text: I like minimalist shoes like these and wear them often but these were very low quality. I have a few pairs of Asics and am generally a fan but these were bad. Ii usually wear a 9 but these ran big. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KristenL

customer_reviews.title: Badass shoes
customer_reviews.text: Super dope shoes. The color was a little bluer than i thought but they grew on me real fast. Very slick looking shoes. Not too good for slick or wet surfaces as the grip is very minimal.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: A great pair of slip-ons
customer_reviews.text: I have an aversion to tying shoelaces, so I nabbed these as soon as I saw them. Unlike another pair of Onitsuka slip-ons I own, this shoe on my feet has a couple uncomfortable spots I’ll need to break in. No biggie since that’s true for me with most all shoes. Aside from breaking in a spot or two, they look and feel great! And my favorite feature is of course...no laces!!
customer_reviews.author: Henry Cohn

customer_reviews.title: Good change from the lace up.
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about having the slip on bs, the tie, but they are very secure and comfortable on the heel.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Beck

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I've got fairly wide feet and wear size US11, this style shoe is typically to narrow for my feet. But these fit great and are pretty comfortable. Will purchase another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’m usually 10.5 but in these I’m a 10
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe only thing is why did they punch holes where laces would go making them look like I just don’t have laces in looks weird.
customer_reviews.author: Primo

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfy and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers! Very versatile and comfy! Slip on easy, nicely made! Will buy again when my pair wears out!
customer_reviews.author: jodi A

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and feel of these shoes. More color options would be fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Onitsuka Tiger - Unisex-Adult Serrano Slip-On Shoes
product_meta.description: Add some spice to your steez with the classic Onitsuka Tiger by ASICS® Serrano Slip-On sneaker! Heritage runner silhouette inspired by high-performance track spikes of the '70s. Uppers of suede and textile materials. Slip-on closure with a laceless design. Lightly-padded collar and tongue provides a snug, comfy fit. Textile linings with cushioned footbed for added comfort. Low-profile EVA midsole. Nubby rubber outsole for durable wear. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 9 oz Product measurements were taken using size Men's 12, width Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Add some spice to your steez with the classic Onitsuka Tiger by ASICS® Serrano Slip-On sneaker!
Heritage runner silhouette inspired by high-performance track spikes of the '70s.
Uppers of suede and textile materials.
Slip-on closure with a laceless design.

Lightly-padded collar and tongue provides a snug, comfy fit. Textile linings with cushioned footbed for added comfort. Low-profile EVA midsole. Nubby rubber outsole for durable wear. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 9 oz Product measurements were taken using size Men's 12, width Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
